titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel SEA SISTER.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

bill.summary: 7/12/1996--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade.
